long_description: The Brunton O.S.S. 20B compass builds on innovations, such as tool-free declination and circle-over-circle alignment, with a clean design that is full-featured yet straightforward and easy to use. Orbital navigation helps eliminate confusion by using a single color and reducing parallax. Tool-free declination adjustment allows easy reading and convenient navigating. Transparent baseplate makes it easy to navigate with a map. The Brunton O.S.S. 20B compass features 2deg resolution, a lanyard and scales in both inches and millimeters.
short_description: The Brunton O.S.S. 20B compass builds on innovations, such as tool-free declination and circle-over-circle alignment, with a clean design that is full-featured yet straightforward and easy to use.
